alert.note: Alert for Dukes; Nantucket (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued March 03 at 4:26PM EST until March 04 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO NOON EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...One to two feet of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (4.2 to 5.2 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Dukes MA and Nantucket MA Counties. * WHEN...From 8 AM to noon EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding begins on Easy Street in Nantucket. Minor flooding begins on Dock Street and Chappy Ferry in Edgartown; and Beach Road, Water Street and Five Corners in Vineyard Haven. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A storm surge around 2 feet is expected at Nantucket and 2.5 feet at Edgartown. The worst case scenario is a 3 ft surge at Edgartown which would result in areas of moderate flooding. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Vineyard Haven MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 6.5 ft, Major 8.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 6.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 03/09 PM 2.2/ 2.7 0.2/ 0.7 0.9/ 1.4 1-2 None 04/10 AM 4.0/ 4.5 2.0/ 2.5 2.6/ 3.1 5-6 Minor 04/09 PM 2.3/ 2.8 0.4/ 0.9 1.2/ 1.7 5 None 05/09 AM 2.1/ 2.6 0.1/ 0.6 0.8/ 1.3 2-3 None 05/10 PM 1.5/ 2.0 -0.6/-0.1 0.1/ 0.6 2 None 06/11 AM 1.4/ 1.9 -0.7/-0.2 -0.2/ 0.3 3 None Nantucket Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 6.5 ft, Major 8.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 2.9 ft, Major 4.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 03/11 PM 3.2/ 3.7 -0.3/ 0.2 1.1/ 1.6 2-3 None 04/10 AM 5.0/ 5.5 1.4/ 1.9 2.0/ 2.5 7-8 Minor 04/11 PM 3.9/ 4.4 0.2/ 0.8 1.5/ 2.0 7-8 None 05/10 AM 3.5/ 4.0 -0.2/ 0.3 0.6/ 1.1 4-5 None 05/11 PM 2.7/ 3.2 -1.0/-0.5 0.2/ 0.7 3 None 06/12 PM 3.2/ 3.7 -0.5/ 0.0 0.2/ 0.7 3-4 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
